Question: bHaptics Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
bHaptics Inc.

TactSuit X40

- A haptic suit with 40 feedback points across the upper body for precise touch sensations in VR experiences
- 18-hour battery life for extended use
- Lightweight and comfortable design
- Compatible with various VR setups
- Tactosy for Arms and TactGloves also available for immersive VR experiences
- Wireless connectivity over Bluetooth
- Supported in around 200 games and with many devices
- Special effects such as simulating being punched, using a healing item, and translating audio to vibrations
- Customizable haptic experience with an equalizer
- TactGlove launching later this year
- Ecosystem of games supporting the devices
- Planned support for PlayStation VR games
